fees: Filing fee as specified in the instructions.
description: This form is used by an employer to petition USCIS for an alien beneficiary to come temporarily to the United States as a nonimmigrant to perform services or labor, or to receive training.

required_fields.name: Petitioner's legal name
required_fields.description: The legal name of the individual or organization filing the petition.

required_fields.name: Beneficiary's information
required_fields.description: Information about the alien beneficiary including personal details.

required_fields.name: Classification type
required_fields.description: The specific nonimmigrant classification being requested (e.g., H-3, P-1, etc.).

required_fields.name: Signature
required_fields.description: The signature of the petitioner or authorized representative.

submission_method: Submit the completed form and supporting documents to USCIS by mail.
target_applicants: U.S. employers, U.S. agents, or U.S. sponsors filing for nonimmigrant classifications.
discovered_by_query: Form I-129 petition nonimmigrant worker PDF
supporting_documents: Evidence required by statute and regulations
Full English translation of any foreign language documents
